channel.title: mobile computing on Lillian Tsai
channel.description: Recent content in mobile computing on Lillian Tsai

item.title: enClosure: Group Communication via Encounter Closures
item.description: enClosure is a service providing group communication based on encounter closures for mobile and IoT applications. We implemented a prototype implementation for Android and the Microsoft Embedded Social Cloud platform. Using real-world traces, we showed that enClosure provides a privacy-preserving, secure platform for a wide range of group communication applications rangingfrom connecting attendees of a large event and virtual guest books to disseminating health risk warnings, lost-and-found, and tracing missing persons.
